actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to repeal the sunset of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 with respect to the elimination of the 60-month limit and an increase in the income limitation on the student loan interest deduction.

summary.text: Amends the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 to repeal provisions which sunset the elimination of the 60-month limit, and an increase in the income limitation, on the student loan interest deduction.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the sunset of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 with respect to the elimination of the 60-month limit and an increase in the income limitation on the student loan interest deduction.
